actions.name: A new message is sent
actions.description: Triggered when a new message is sent in a Discord channel.

parameters.name: channel_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Discord channel where the message was sent.

parameters.name: author_id
parameters.description: The ID of the user who sent the message.

actions.name: A message is deleted
actions.description: Triggered when a message is deleted in a Discord channel.

parameters.name: channel_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Discord channel where the message was deleted.

parameters.name: message_id
parameters.description: The ID of the deleted message.

actions.name: A message is edited
actions.description: Triggered when a message is edited in a Discord channel.

parameters.name: channel_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Discord channel where the message was edited.

parameters.name: message_id
parameters.description: The ID of the edited message.

parameters.name: new_content
parameters.description: The new content of the edited message.

reactions.name: Send a message in a channel
reactions.description: Send a message to a specific Discord channel.

parameters.name: channel_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Discord channel where the message should be sent.

parameters.name: message_content
parameters.description: The content of the message to send.

reactions.name: Delete a message
reactions.description: Delete a specific message in a Discord channel.

parameters.name: channel_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Discord channel where the message should be deleted.

parameters.name: message_id
parameters.description: The ID of the message to delete.

reactions.name: Pin/Unpin a message
reactions.description: Pin or unpin a specific message in a Discord channel.

parameters.name: channel_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Discord channel where the message should be pinned or unpinned.

parameters.name: message_id
parameters.description: The ID of the message to pin or unpin.

parameters.name: is_pinned
parameters.description: Set to true to pin the message, or false to unpin it.
